Service Details: - Offers the FREE Park n Play family summer program in neighborhood parks DURING JULY AND AUGUST- Families can try beachball, volleyball, dodge ball, bocce or participate in relay races, and other activities- Provides an opportunity to meet neighbors, make friends, participate in games, sports and activities- Look for the Park n Play Trailer neighborhood parks, or visit the Active Kelowna webpage for details- MANDATORY: all children must be accompanied by an adult
Former Name: Recreation, Parks and Cultural Services, Active Communities
